Interface ItemDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface ItemDAO

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deleteItemById(Long id)
    Deletes an Item entity from the data storage by its unique id.
    List<Item>
    findAllItems()
    Retrieves a list of all Item entities in the data storage.

    findItemById(Long id)
    Finds an Item entity by its unique id.

    saveItem(Item item)
    Saves the given Item entity in the data storage.

  • Method Details

    • saveItem

      Item saveItem(Item item)
      Saves the given Item entity in the data storage.
      Parameters:
      item - The Item object to be saved.
      Returns:
      The saved Item object.

    • findAllItems

      List<Item> findAllItems()
      Retrieves a list of all Item entities in the data storage.
      Returns:
      A list of Item objects representing all items.

    • findItemById

      Optional<Item> findItemById(Long id)
      Finds an Item entity by its unique id.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique id of the Item to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the found Item, or an empty Optional if not found.

    • deleteItemById

      void deleteItemById(Long id)
      Deletes an Item entity from the data storage by its unique id.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique id of the Item to be deleted.
